Details: Identified where verification data connects to listing workflow. Mapped data flow between systems.
Adding fields for verification status and results. Ensuring backward compatibility.
Create endpoints for submitting and retrieving verification data. Document API contracts.
Ensure real-time update of listing status based on verification. Handle edge cases for failed or pending verifications.
Verify end-to-end flow from verification to listing approval. Use test data and real listings.
Prepare technical documentation for integration. Include example payloads and error handling.
Allow admins to override or reset verification status if needed.
